title: [Self-directed] Worked Example Video Utilization Strategies for Blended Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering principles and job-related foundational knowledge
context.additional_context: Language-integrated engineering education for working professionals, evaluating practical application skills through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Explain over 80% of engineering problem-solving steps using Worked Example Videos (WEVs)
Apply complex engineering concepts to three or more real-world cases by combining audio explanations and visuals from videos
Efficiently navigate Worked Example Videos on online platforms and locate/leverage required materials within 5 minutes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
